item.title: A blog reborn
item.description: richardplacide.com started as a static site using http://jekyllrb.coml and Github Pages. Then I moved to a self-hosted WordPress installation. WordPress is a fantastic platform but there are so many virtues to a static website that I had to try again, this time with http://gohugo.io.
